title: FORT90 TV
excerpt: Live, from Twitch dot TV forward slash Wonderville NYC, it's FORT90 TV! And this Monday is another seven to EIGHT HOUR LONG (?!?!?) re-broadcast of nearly lost transmissions from across the globe.

title: Hot Dog Appreciation Night
excerpt:
Come one! Come all to the 2nd annual Hot Dog Appreciation Night hosted by Jenn de la Vega. Celebrate the best Wonderville hot dog name and flavor of 2023. 

The winning hot dogs will be served and a special trophy will be awarded to the best name. Everyone who helped name a hot dog will receive a certificate on the stage (or it will be mailed to you). 

Join in on the big hot dog quiz of the year and win prizes! We will be serving drink specials from Misguided Spirits, an employee-owned Brooklyn company. And of course, Brooklyn Cured hot dogs will be for sale at the bar (while supplies last). 

Feel good hot dog party music will be curated by Alon Bisk and our very own DJ Softserve.

title: Alchemy Release Show
excerpt: An eclectic night of experimental, abstract Hip-Hop and Electronic music! Featuring underground artists Chow, Sasco, GANAWAE, buddy.not.bud, Big Flowers and Jay Cinema

title: Killer Queen Open Hive Night
excerpt:
Every Wednesday is Killer Queen Freeplay Night! Come learn how to play the popular 10-player arcade game from some of NYC’s best players! 

Each week there is a tournament. Sign ups are at 8pm, tournament commences at 8:30pm. Make new friends, learn to play Killer Queen!

title: Arcade Commons Fundraiser Closing Party
excerpt: Join us at the closing party for the Arcade Commons Fundraiser! Your donations help us in our mission to marry art and arcade gaming, and support the creation of new cabinets. Let's celebrate building up the in-person gaming community, and the joy of indie arcades!

title: WEEB ADJACENT
excerpt: IT'S BACK!! BUT AGAIN!! 😭😤🥺

title: Tackycardia
excerpt: Tackycardia returns to Wonderville for its tenth installment and 1 year anniversary with the same card they began the series with. Expect 150+ bpm beats, free entry and free to play arcade games and plenty more to come in the second year of the series!

title: Wonderville Karaoke
excerpt: You got the music in you? Come down to Wonderville, on the second Sunday of every month, to share a song with the gentle hum of DIY arcade games as your backup singers. Or simply be entertained by the vocal stylings of randos off the street. Either way, don't forget to tip your bartender!

title: WordHack feat. Blake Andrews, Orion Martin and Nolen Royalty
excerpt: WordHack is a monthly evening of performances and talks exploring the intersection of language and technology. Code poetry, digital literature, e-lit, language games, coders interested in the creative side, writers interested in new forms writing can take, all are welcome here.

title: Pixelfest
excerpt: Hang with us during Pixelfest for a night full of games, drinks, and music ranging from electronic, indie, slow gaze, and everything in between. It also just so happen’s to be  Jujujaxx’s birthday celebration ;)

title: Saison Zero
excerpt: Your friendly neighborhood Tabletop RPG Meetup ! Bring your dice! Bring your friends! Bring Nothing! Anyone and everyone with a open mind and imagination are welcome!

title: 2019 Was Five Years Ago
excerpt:
DJ Silent Light will play a danceable, oddball, and overall powerfully micro-nostalgic four-hour set comprising entirely songs from 2019, hearkening back to an era before the world was flipped upside-down, and which is liable to feel like it is not really five years ago. 

Arcade games and dance hits by Ariana Grande, Caroline Polachek, and many more will add to the vibe of reminiscence and good times.

title: Parsons Design & Technology Pop-up Arcade
excerpt: Positioned as a work-in-progress, students from both BFA and MFA Design and Technology programs at Parsons School of Design are demoing their latest playful creations - games, playful experiences, immersive storytelling pieces, alternative game controllers, and more.

title: iL03, spawater, Arklight, Receiver
excerpt:
A collection of sounds and experiences from the New York noise scene. Come out to hear shrieks and freaks at Wonderville, it will be a night of experimental noise pop! 

We'll have Receiver starting off with some rocky noise, followed by Arklight with some punky noise, spawater with some smooth noise, rounding things off with a noisey electro-pop DJ set by iL03.

title: Sonic Fusion Night
excerpt:
🎸 Wonderville Presents: Sonic Fusion Night! 🌌

Get ready for an electrifying evening of diverse musical experiences at Wonderville on March 9th, 2024. Our stage will be graced by an eclectic lineup that promises to transport you through the sonic realms of Psych/Math, Brooklyn Alt Rock, NJ Indie, Rock from the NJ/NY scene, and a unique blend of Kletztronica from New York.

🔮 Acts of the Night:

The Juice Is Okay (Psych/Math) 🌀
Embark on a mind-bending journey with The Juice Is Okay as they fuse intricate mathematical rhythms with psychedelic vibes. Prepare to have your senses stirred and your mind expanded.

Warpark (Brooklyn Alt Rock) 🏙️
Hailing from the vibrant streets of Brooklyn, Warpark brings an alternative rock experience that's both raw and refined. Their powerful soundscapes and soulful lyrics will leave you wanting more.

Melancholy Party (NJ Indie) 🌈
Join the indie spirit with Melancholy Party, a New Jersey gem known for their soulful melodies and introspective lyrics. Lose yourself in their atmospheric tunes and indie charm.

Soul Vacancy (NJ/NY Rock) 🎶
Let Soul Vacancy take you on a ride through the energetic landscapes of NJ/NY rock. Their dynamic performance and infectious rhythms will have you moving and grooving all night long.

Chaia (Kletztronica DJ, NY) 🎧
Bringing a fusion of klezmer and electronica, Chaia will be our sonic navigator for the night. Immerse yourself in the Kletztronica vibes as they mix traditional sounds with futuristic beats.

🌟 Date & Venue:

Date: March 9th, 2024
Venue: Wonderville
Mark your calendars, gather your friends, and join us for a night where genres collide, and music unites. Get ready to experience the magic of Sonic Fusion at Wonderville! 🚀🎶

title: FRAMEBOOST
excerpt: We're kickin' it live! Introducing: FRAMEBOOST, a party inspired by the sounds and styles of the Jet Set Radio series. Join us for a night of 90's and 2000's house, breakbeats, and video game soundtracks. DJs Fat Frog, Janus Rose, Ezra, and Metal Bostich are bringing an eclectic mix of funky fresh beats, with live visuals by tench.nology :) Come to dance and play arcade games!

title: KQ Wonderville Monthly BYOT (Bring Your Own Team)!
excerpt: Watch some of the best Killer Queen players bring teams and face off in a tournament of the popular and fast-paced ten player strategy arcade platformer 🐝👑⚔️ while enjoying good company and, if you like, a dish to share to enjoy some good food! Or just bring yourself and your excitement for cheering on your favorite teams!

title: Disasterpiece Movie Night: Born Into Mafia
excerpt: The best of the worst is on display at Disasterpiece. This month's film, 'Born Into Mafia', a zero-budget, zero-charisma movie about the Russian mob. It's going to be awful. Come watch!

title: Saison Zero
excerpt: Saison Zero here! Again! You're friendly neighborhood Tabletop RPG Meetup is back to celebrate it's 1 year anniversary!! This one will be having an open game jam. Designers, players, passerby's, come on down! Bring your dice! Bring your friends! Bring Nothing! Anyone and everyone with a open mind and imagination are welcome! There's going to be a lot to do (with a few surprises sprinkled in).

title: Sour Baby Presents: P0L4r1S, Fortunate Danger, yion, Bruno Zero
excerpt: A super sour night of live coding sets from P0L4r1S, the debut of duo-electronic act FortunateDanger, and DJ sets from yion & Bruno Zero!

title: Queerness in 2024
excerpt:
🌈✨ Explore the future of identity with "Queerness in 2024"! 🎨🏳️‍🌈 This dynamic mixed media and performance exhibition dives into the meaning of being queer and trans in 2024. 

Join us for a one-day celebration of NYC's vibrant LGBTQ+ artistry on January 19, 2024. 

Don't miss this display of creativity and expression! #Queerness2024 #LGBTQArt #NYCArtists 🎭🖼️🌟

title: Bounce Haus
excerpt:
Club Wonderland invites you to… BOUNCE HAUS 

A night of open decks & B2Bs. 

Showcasing an exciting array of NYC DJs that’ll have you jumping all night, BOUNCE HAUS is dedicated to the spirit of spontaneity and play. 

We’ll have solo sets for you to enjoy before closing out the fun with a FULL CAST B2B! Our VJ Jock (@nonbinaryjakepaul) & vendors are bringing their own artistic excellence with zines from Carmen DeCristo (@fotodecristo) prints from @Caramellcast, patches/artwork from @Gender98, handmade plushies from  @CochinaDivina, and a live makeup booth by @Glitter_Macabre. Come thru, hop on in, and enjoy the ride ☆

title: Morphism NYC Presents: Cube Romp!
excerpt:
Morphism NYC Presents: Cube Romp! 

A night of experimental / deconstructed bass and club music. 

Join us as we welcome DJs Blind Pharaoh ,Space Helmet, Rmzi, 88 Katanas, Shvlfce, and kTLT for a special evening of curated rhythmically atypical and deconstructed soundscapes, pushing the limits of the intersection between bass / club music, experimental art / visuals, and rave culture."

title: Tackycardia
excerpt: It was an amazing first year of @tackycardia_nyc thanks to the wonderful patrons of Wonderville, and now we're back with our first show of 2024! For this iteration we've got Neurodelinquent in from Massachusetts as well as Evie from Philly, plus Tacky debut sets from NYC locals Evim and Cowgrrrl.
